articles.author: Colin Laidley
articles.title: Nvidia's Gains Have Made It Bigger Than Europe's Largest Stock Markets - Investopedia
articles.description: Nvidia shares continued to rise on Thursday, extending the AI chipmaker's lead on Microsoft, which it overtook as the world’s most valuable company on Tuesday. Its surging stock price has made it more valuable than every European stock market.
articles.content:
• Nvidia shares continued to rise on Thursday, extending the AI chipmaker's lead on Microsoft, which it overtook as the worlds most valuable company on Tuesday.

articles.author: Nadeen Ebrahim
articles.title: Why Hezbollah is threatening this tiny European country - CNN
articles.description: The very mention of Cyprus adds a new dimension to the Israel-Hamas conflict. It risks drawing a European Union nation into a war that has already spread across the Middle East and puts the spotlight on Cyprus’s ties with Israel.
articles.content: In a fiery speech Wednesday, Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah singled out nearby Cyprus, threatening to target the small Mediterranean island if it aids Israel in a potential war between the Lebanes… [+6457 chars]
